articles.title: 3 Vanguard ETFs to Buy With $2,000 and Hold Forever
articles.mainIdea: 3 Vanguard ETFs to Buy With $2,000 and Hold Forever
articles.summary: Motley Fool: 3 Vanguard ETFs to Buy With $2,000 and Hold Forever. Simpler is almost always better, particularly when you can achieve so much high-quality diversification with such a small number of holdings.

articles.title: Retirees keep missing this 1 invisible cost until they realize it’s drained thousands of dollars. Are you paying it too?

This silent drag on your finances could be draining thousands of dollars from your nest egg over a 30-year investment horizon Related tickers mentioned: HOOD.

articles.title: Silent Time Bomb Threatens 6 AI S&P 500 Stocks Loading Up With Debt
articles.mainIdea: Silent Time Bomb Threatens 6 AI S&P 500 Stocks Loading Up With Debt
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Silent Time Bomb Threatens 6 AI S&P 500 Stocks Loading Up With Debt. Debt used to be a dirty word for tech companies. But many are now borrowing like crazy as AI is pushing them to spend heavily. Related tickers mentioned: NVDA, ORCL, SPY, ^GSPC.
